synopsis.text: Kenni, a young man eager to step out of his military commander father's shadow, finds himself on an unexpected journey when a risky move transports him from his spaceship to a mysterious planet called Expel. On this planet, magic and monsters abound, and technology is unheard of. He meets Rena, a lively girl with enigmatic powers who believes Kenni to be a legendary hero prophesied to save their world. Together, they embark on a quest to find the Sorcery Globe, a meteorite causing chaos and destruction across the planet. As they navigate this new world filled with gods and their cunning advisors, Kenni must hide his technological tools while trying to fulfill his new role as the fabled Warrior of Light. Will they be able to stop the Sorcery Globe and save Expel before it's too late? Join Kenni and Rena on their thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
